We've been wanting to come to Lolla for years.
It's a huge event with an incredible lineup of bands...
...smack in the middle of a big, beautiful city.
The days start off casual with front and center spots for the up-and-coming artists.
And as the day progresses, the more insane everything gets.
Over three days, we jammed for 30 hours, walked approximately 20 miles,...
...drank a dozen or so Chicago beers and gorged ourselves on various types of street food.
I'm proud of those stats for one weekend.
But what really makes me happy is knowing that at the end of the day,...
...I get to crash in my own bed.
